/** @format */ import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { register } from '../actions/userActions'; import MessageBox from '../components/MessageBox'; import LoadingBox from '../components/LoadingBox'; import { USER_REGISTER_RESET } from '../constants/userConstants'; function Register(props) { const [firstName, setFirstName] = useState(''); const [lastName, setLastName] = useState(''); const [phone, setPhone] = useState(''); const [password, setPassword] = useState(''); const userRegister = useSelector((state) => state.userRegister); const { loading, userInfo, error } = userRegister; const dispatch = useDispatch(); const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); dispatch(register(firstName, lastName, phone, password )); }; return (
{loading ? ( ) : (
{error && {error}} {userInfo && ( Registration is successful. )}

Create Account

Get started with your free account

setFirstName(e.target.value)} required={true} />
setLastName(e.target.value)} required={true} />
setPhone(e.target.value)} required={true} />
setPassword(e.target.value)} required={true} />
setState(e.target.value)} required={true} />
setCity(e.target.value)} required={true} />
setCluster(e.target.value)} required={true} />

Have an account? Log in

)}
); } export default Register;
